thread.title: Actress linked to Kylie Minogue's ex-fiance 'very upset' over claims she played a part in split
thread.title_full: Actress linked to Kylie Minogue's ex-fiance 'very upset' over claims she played a part in split

author: Halina Watts
title: Actress linked to Kylie Minogue's ex-fiance 'very upset' over claims she played a part in split
text:
Actress Marta Milans doesn't want to be 'caught up' in the star's break-up (Photo: Rex Features) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
An actress linked to Kylie Minogue ’s ex Joshua Sasse is said to be “devastated” at suggestions she caused the split . 
Marta Milans spent two days being consoled by her close friend Karolina Wydra in New York. 
Posting on Instragram , she wrote: “Thank you for hugging me all weekend Karolina Wydra. I don’t know what I would do without you. Friends forever.” 
A pal said: “Marta wouldn’t want to get caught up in something like this, she is very upset by the whole thing. Read More Why isn't Kylie Minogue lucky, lucky, lucky, in love? After her latest split, a look at her relationships Kylie Minogue with ex-fiance Joshua Sasse (Photo: FameFlynet.uk.com) 
“It has been really hard for her being under the spotlight. She is baffled and unsure about what to do next.” 
Joshua met Marta, 34, while making TV show No Tomorrow in Vancouver. A show source said it was “well known” they had grown close. Like us on Facebook
